review_text: This place is very good to refresh yourself from the city life, the ambiance is great and peaceful the food is tasty and love the exterior and interior design of this place, worth to visit and highly recommended.
If you seek an escape from the bustling city life, this location offers a perfect retreat for relaxation and picturesque "blogger posts" on Instagram üòÑ. ‚Ä¶

Amazing place. Clean and super beautiful! The workers/staff were also really kind and welcoming. They have 3 levels of parking, just a little warning on how steep the road to the parking is. The food at the restaurant was really delicious. Would also recommend the halo-halo! So far, we had a really good experience here.
The places is amazing and the food is.fantastic

Steep uphill climb. 100 peso entrance (consumable). Friendly attendants and quick service. View is awesome and food is delicious. My family enjoyed this place. Would definitely recommend this place to family and friends.

Very nice except for mosquitoes at night...
It's a nice place for a family date, The staff are accommodating and the food is delicious, The place defines peace and ambiance.
Found this place on last days of trip..great coffee, and would be a nice place to have a meal..great view.

Beautiful Garden.  Huge and plenty of space to roam around. Cozy and relaxing that you would want to stay for hours. Entrance fee of P100 is fully consumable at their cafe/resto  and their food is delicious and inexpensive! Ideal for family bonding, friends get together and romantic dates. And its not far from the city center.
Beautiful and nice place to relax
Staff are nice + CR is well maintained + Food is very affordable (you can't say overpriced) = Nice Experience

A nice place to relax and look at the flowers. The 100P entrance fee includes 100P off your bill at the cafe, so you can think of it as free entrance with the purchase of anything. The terraces are quite steep, so it's more exertion than a stroll, but there are benches to relax on if you need a break.
very nice place with good restaurant
Awesome and quiet place to unwind and detach. A get away from the city

Wonderful!  Much better than Sirao gardens.
Place is relaxing, floral display is amazing, personel are friendly.

Steep terraced garden.  Nicely landscaped.  Nice cafe and cottages for rent for picnic.  Small but if you love plants, it's a great escape from the city.  Lots of mosquitos bring repellent.

A rejuvenating green getaway in Cebu's highland

The place is small and it can get pretty crowded with all the people having a photoshoot. It is very quite most of the time though and a good place to rest. Not windy at all since situated in a valley.

Month of May not so many flowers. But peaceful atmosphere. Nice little coffeeshop serving small dishes. Better order Philippine foo. II had the "Schnitzel" and a horrible diarhe at night. Transport for the way back complicate. Quite far away from the city.

Nice place to chill with an overlooking view.

Place is superb and peaceful. They have large servings for food but with a cheap price. Good for romantic dates or catching up with friends. A nice place to unwind and relax. Their food is pretty good too!
Wow the place is beautiful. The best place to have your breakfast. Food was good! The staff are accomodating and friendly. The place is sooo relaxing.

ok here to have coffee and relax. The place is worth an IG post
A nice place to while away time sipping coffee and looking at the scenic views.

Beautiful flowers with small benches with covers and fans where you can sit and relax. There is a small cafe as well. However it is a long uphill drive to get here and not that much to see besides flowers and plants.
This spot is nice and great looking in the morning until afternoon but its nothing in the evening. Food is nice and staff is great.
Lovely garden in the mountains. A bit limited on variety of flora and fauna but lovely ambience with lots of spots to just sit and relax.

The entrance fee is Php 100 per person but the Php 40 there is consumable at their resto. It's a cozy place if you want to dine with a flowery view. The foods' prices are ok and it's truly a good place to bring your visitors for a change.
Perfect place for nature lover and flower enthusiast. The food is good but serve a bit longer. Foods are bit expensive for local tourists.
Have nice Cabana's for lazing the afternoon away. they serve food and drinks but service is very slow and food is just ordinary and not noteworthy.
Wonderful garden. A place to see if you travel at Cebu City.
Fantastic fantastic! Must go if you are in the area. Beautiful flowers and tranquil space to have a cup of coffee and stroller around for a while. Beautifully done!
The best place to chill! If you want to immerse yourself with nature, this is the best place to be.
Peaceful and lovely place. But the service is quite bad.
Great flower farm done with intricate arrangement... breathe-taking views!!!
awesomely green and calm place.. if you are looking for a place to chill that's peaceful close to nature and this is the right place
The food service is so bad. Waited for our food for almost an hour. Not recommended for other people to go there. So disappointed by their service!
The place is worth visiting, there is a cafe that's very romantic and special kiosk/spaces good for lovers but can also be for groups. All corners are instagram-worthy.
Amazing view with few cottages to sit around. Superb place for flower/garden lovers.
Relaxing place and great for pics.

The place was cool. It's just, the service in their cafe is awfully slow, you will have to wait for almost an hour to have your order served. But for the record, their food and beverages taste really good. Although I'm still not sure if it's enough to say that the wait is worth it.
love the place. so quiet, maybe because we got there on weekdays .
Great botanical garden to relax and enjoy flowers of various species.
Tranquil place..nice to reflect and have some heart to talk with your love one,its quite far so better a lot ample of time to get thereüòä ‚Ä¶
Nice, relaxing view! Connects you to nature.
New place to visit in cebu, if you dont want to go as far as sirao. We had a blast!
A hidden gem in the Busay mountain. Not as popular as Sirao but showcases more beautiful flower formations!
i love this place, very charming, have a cafe on top. with a very nice view. very good for couples.
Super nice and quiet and chill place to rest and unwind from the city.... Only mosquitoes were killing me there :) wear protection

The coffee shop is open. I like their coffee and there's net connection. Love it!  Sirao might have more perks because it has more view and statues but I was really searching for a place to unwind. If you're just going here for photos I think you would be dismayed though.
Very satisfying. Good food. Good scenery. Everything is amazing. For nature enthusiast.
Nice place to relax. Beautiful flowers. Not quiet though because there are speakers all over even at the cabanas. Cabanas have electric fan and nicely upholstered seats. Good music. Good food.
A great place to relax surrounded by beautiful plants and flowers. You can just chill at the coffee shop or stretch out in the cabanas.
Nice place to relax, good ambience, nice views.. Best for photoshoots.. Love their food as well
Great place to enjoy the gardens and varied plants and shrubs
Place is pretty well-landscaped with plants and flowers, architecturally designed gazebos, lanais, stairs, walkways, coffeeshops and common areas.
Not accesible , good place to visit if youre in a road trip.
Nice place to unwind. Peaceful and quite.
clean and very peaceful. toilets are also clean. the place has a cafe with affordable price

It was okey. Beautiful flowers and view from the cafe. However the cafe did not have anything and had to come ask us three times to pick someting else to eat.

malalanghap mo ang fresh air.

This was a beautiful place to visit. It has great views and not at all expensive to enter and look around. It is very reasonable if you on a budget or just want a relaxing day.
The place is very quite and relaxing. A must see. You can enjoy their coffee with a great top view of the city, plus you'll get to see different species of flowers and trees.
I like the place although the entrance fee is a little expensive, 100 pesos per person. 40 pesos is consumable. The ambiance is great with lots of flowers and greens. Food is so so.
Nice place,  but don't expect too much so you won't be disappointed.
Entrance of 100 pesos is too expensive just to see the flower garden. There are more beautiful tourist spots with great views and things to offer with cheaper entrance fee.

The place is nice. It has a nice view and the flowers are well maintained. For a small price of 150php per person, you could enjoy it. The place they have for food is ok. I would suggest other places to eat.

Quaint place. The cheesecake is ok. Didnt get a chance to try the rest of the menu because of the blackout. They charge an entrance fee even if you eat at the restaurant. It's the kind of place that encourages conversation :)

Good views with surprisingly good coffee. In addition to the coffee, they had a small wine selection and some snacksalso available. I enjoyed the fact that they labelled the plants properly to make identification easier.
